element.name: gmedec
element.description: Uses libgme to emulate a gaming console sound processors
element.author: Chris Lee <clee@kde.org>, Brian Koropoff <bkoropoff@gmail.com>, Michael Pyne <mpyne@kde.org>, Sebastian Dr√∂ge <sebastian.droege@collabora.co.uk>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-ay; audio/x-gbs; audio/x-gym; audio/x-hes; audio/x-kss; audio/x-nsf; audio/x-sap; audio/x-spc; audio/x-vgm

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, rate=(int)32000, channels=(int)2
